content: सुवर्ण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शोभनो वर्णोऽस्य] {@--1@} Of good or beautiful colour, brilliant in hue, bright, yellow, golden. {@--2@} Of a good tribe or caste. {@--3@} Of good fame, glorious, celebrated. --र्णः {@--1@} A good colour. {@--2@} A good tribe or caste. {@--3@} A sort of sacrifice. {@--4@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--5@} The thorn-apple. --र्णा {@--1@} One of the seven tongues of fire. {@--2@} Black aloe-wood. {@--3@} Turmeric. {@--4@} Colocynth. --र्णं {@--1@} Gold. {@--2@} A golden coin ({%--<ab>m.</ab>%} also); नन्वहं दशसुवर्णान् प्रयच्छामि <ls>Mk. 2.</ls> {@--3@} A weight of gold equal to 16 Māṣas or about 175 grains Troy ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} also). {@--4@} Money, wealth, riches. {@--5@} A sort of yellow sandal-wood. {@--6@} A kind of red chalk. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (नागकेशर).
